about_the_game:
Please join us on Discord for support, offer feedback and SFW / NSFW examples.


The Warrior Class Premium Unlocks provide additional customization features over the base Warrior Class franchise. The primary customization features include:

  • Artist Variants - When artists provide separate base meshes for characters to provide different looks or component options. (When adding characters to a scene, characters that include artist variants will have additional Next/Previous Variants buttons to rotate through the different options.) Over 20 characters in Warrior Class have artist variants.

  • Character Components / Looks - Turn on/off figurine components, such as armor or clothes. Trade out materials to change the color of different components. (After adding a character to a scene, open the Components & Morphs menu and then select Components) When you configure a series of components, you can save them to a look for quick re-loading. Over 40 characters in Warrior Class have components.

  • Blendshapes / Expressions - Many characters in Figurine Scene Simulator include blendshapes to change facial expressions or body part sizes, such as horns, etc. (After adding a character to a scene, open the Components & Blendshapes menu and then select Blendshapes) After updating a series of blendshapes, you can save them as expressions for quick re-loading. Over 12 characters in Warrior Class have blendshapes.

  • Prop Variants - The base game includes collections of props from different franchises. The premium unlock adds several variants to props from the Warrior Class franchise.

  • Store Variants - We add "Store Variants" that provide different looks for characters by pre-selecting different sets of material colors, turning on/off components, such as different hair styles. (When adding characters to scenes, if there are Store Variants, Next/Previous Variants buttons will be displayed) There are currently over 12 Store Variants in Warrior Class - we are actively developing additional Store Variants.

(Note: Not all characters support these features, please ask on our discussion forum if you'd like to know about any figurines in particular.)


You can currently try out these features for free in-game while we're in our "Jumpstart" release phase!

Base Franchise Information

content_descriptors.notes:
Figurine Scene Simulator is meant to be a complete game which can be enjoyed without the use of NSFW type content. However, in addition to being able to exploit camera angles and animations/poses to create sexually suggestive images, there is also a considerable amount of NSFW costumes and nudity* at various levels across a number of the included and expansion figurines as well as some explicit animations.  This content will grow during development.

(*These are enabled in-game by engaging the NSFW/NSFUA Content checkbox)

In addition to horror/gory figurines and scenes, additional fx will be added to allow for extremely violent/gory scenes.

Note: All Characters are 18 or older.

detailed_description:
Please join us on Discord for support, offer feedback and SFW / NSFW examples.


The Warrior Class Premium Unlocks provide additional customization features over the base Warrior Class franchise. The primary customization features include:

  • Artist Variants - When artists provide separate base meshes for characters to provide different looks or component options. (When adding characters to a scene, characters that include artist variants will have additional Next/Previous Variants buttons to rotate through the different options.) Over 20 characters in Warrior Class have artist variants.

  • Character Components / Looks - Turn on/off figurine components, such as armor or clothes. Trade out materials to change the color of different components. (After adding a character to a scene, open the Components & Morphs menu and then select Components) When you configure a series of components, you can save them to a look for quick re-loading. Over 40 characters in Warrior Class have components.

  • Blendshapes / Expressions - Many characters in Figurine Scene Simulator include blendshapes to change facial expressions or body part sizes, such as horns, etc. (After adding a character to a scene, open the Components & Blendshapes menu and then select Blendshapes) After updating a series of blendshapes, you can save them as expressions for quick re-loading. Over 12 characters in Warrior Class have blendshapes.

  • Prop Variants - The base game includes collections of props from different franchises. The premium unlock adds several variants to props from the Warrior Class franchise.

  • Store Variants - We add "Store Variants" that provide different looks for characters by pre-selecting different sets of material colors, turning on/off components, such as different hair styles. (When adding characters to scenes, if there are Store Variants, Next/Previous Variants buttons will be displayed) There are currently over 12 Store Variants in Warrior Class - we are actively developing additional Store Variants.

(Note: Not all characters support these features, please ask on our discussion forum if you'd like to know about any figurines in particular.)


You can currently try out these features for free in-game while we're in our "Jumpstart" release phase!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R390 3GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1650 6GB

short_description: The Warrior Class Premium Unlocks provide additional customization features including Artist Variants, Character Components, Morphs/Blendshapes and Store Variants.You can currently try out these features for free in-game while we're in our "Jumpstart" release phase!
